snippet: The drug maker is now selling its billion-dollar erectile dysfunction drug, among the world’s most counterfeited, directly to men with a prescription.
abstract: Pfizer is taking unusual step of selling its $2 billion-dollar erectile dysfunction drug Viagra to consumers on its Web site, in effort to establish presence in huge online market for popular blue pill, considered to be among world's most counterfeited drugs; experts estimate that firm could be losing hundreds of millions of dollars annually to black market of online pharmacies.
lead_paragraph: The drug maker is now selling its billion-dollar erectile dysfunction drug, among the world’s most counterfeited, directly to men with a prescription.

headline.main: Facing Black Market, Pfizer Is Looking Online to Sell Viagra
headline.print_headline: Pfizer Turning to Internet to Sell Viagra
